## The new cases of NYC at zipcode level



## This is the Introduction



## The table

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
Junedata = read.csv("./data/Junedata.csv")
```

```{r,echo = FALSE}
table = Junedata %>% 
  mutate(display = paste0("+",newcases_june,
                          "<br>",
                          positive)) %>% 
  select(zipcode, neighborhood_name,display,covid_death_count,day) %>%
  filter(day == "June28") %>% 
  arrange(zipcode)

knitr::kable(table,align = "ccccc")
```
